life_date: Attributed to Torii Kiyomasu, Japanese, act. c. 1704–1718
medium: Woodblock print (tan-e), ink and limited color on paper, with hand-applied color
provenance: Wakai Kenzaburō; Philippe R. Stoclet (until Sotheby's London, May 3, 1965, lot 48); Jack Hillier; Richard P. Gale (until 1974)
text: on the horseback: Teika; attendant: Oe Saemon; woman leading horse: Nowake
title: Fujiwara no Teika on Horseback Accompanied by Ōe Saemon and The Woman Nowake
